title: Are there Disassembler for Mac which supports scripting
content: Are there any disassemblers for Mac that comes in freeware. I have installed radare2 but finding difficult to use.

answers_data.content: I would recommend capstone disassembler, it supports multiple architectures. Pydasm is also quite simple and nice disassembler.

Pydasm is outdated, wrong on many cases, so do not go for that. 

Capstone is definitely the best choice now, and works on MacOS very well.
